data.text: Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Kik ipandna wangʼi sa ma chunya lit.
Nimar ndalona rumo piyo ka iro;
Chunya orewore kendo oner ka lum;
Chur ma achurgo matek
Achalo gi tula mar bungu,
Asiko aneno anena,
Odiechiengʼ duto wasika kinya ka gijara;
Nimar achamo buch kendo kaka chiemba
nikech mirimbi maduongʼ,
Ndalona chalo gi tipo modhiambo;
In to ibet e kom lochni nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Ibiro aa malo mi ikech Sayun,
Nimar kitene beyo gi lala ne jotichni,
Ogendini biro luoro nying Jehova Nyasaye,
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro gero Sayun
Obiro dwoko lamo mar ngʼama ok nyal
Wachni mondo ondik piny ne tiengʼ mabiro,
“Jehova Nyasaye nongʼiyo piny gie kare maler man malo,
mondo owinj ywak joma otwe
Kuom mano nying Jehova Nyasaye ibiro hul e Sayun,
ka joma odak e pinjeruodhi ochokore
Ka noyudo ngimana dhi maber to nomiyo tekona odok chien
Omiyo ne awacho niya,
Kar chakruok ne iketo mise mag piny,
Gin to ginilal nono in to isiko manyaka chiengʼ;
In to isiko ichalri mana kaka in,
Nyithind jotichni biro dak buti machiegni;
